name: Rocksuki
description:
A fan game made for the live streamer Selen Tatsuki of Nijisanji EN

A platformer inspired by the timed platforms of early megaman games that infuriated her greatly, thus a game based entirely on them!

Game Development by @Gioba_art
Pixel Art by @OrangeDactyl
Music is remixes of songs by DOVA-SYNDROME

If your controller is connected with bluetooth and is having issues, try plugging it in. For some reason bluetooth doesn't work for some people.

If you notice a bug, please leave a comment so I can try to fix it!

If you need to locate save files, go to the game's folder, navigate to the data folder and the selen.tatsuki files are your save files.
